data.eml:eml: Grallipeza Rondani (Diptera: Micropezidae: Taeniapterinae) of the Caribbean and North America

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marshall, S. A. (2013): Grallipeza Rondani (Diptera: Micropezidae: Taeniapterinae) of the Caribbean and North America. Zootaxa 3682 (1): 45-84, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3682.1.2
